maqras.text: Ta ha
Ware ga anata ni kuruan o kudashita no wa, anata o nayamasu tamede wanai
Omo o osoreru mono e no, kunkai nihokanaranai
Daichi to takai sho ten to o tsukuri nasa reru, kare kara kudasa reta keijidearu
Jihibukaki okata wa, gyokuza ni chinza nasa reru
Ten ni ari-chi ni aru mono, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono, mata, shimetta tsuchi no shita ni aru mono wa, subete kare no monodearu
Tatoe anata ga ogoe de hanashite mo (Sekiri naku), kare wa, hime rareta koto mo kakusa rete iru koto mo shitte ora reru
Arra, kare no soto ni kami wa nai nodearu. Mottomo utsukushi gyomei wa kare ni zokusuru
Musa no monogatari ga, anata ni todoita ka
Kare ga hi o mite, kazoku ni itta toki no koto o omoi nasai. `Tomare, watashi wa hi o mita. Tabun asoko kara, hi-wa o mochikaeru koto ga dekiyou. Aruiwa ano hi de, michibika reru kamo shirenai
Daga kare ga soko ni kita toki,-goe ga atte yoba reta. `Musa yo
hontoni ware wa anata no omodearu. Dakara kutsu o nuge. Ima anata wa, towa no hijiridani ni iru nodearu
Ware wa anata o eranda. Dakara (anata ni) keiji suru koto o kike
Hontoni ware wa arradearu. Ware no soto ni kami wanai. Dakara ware ni tsukae, ware o kokoro ni daite reihai no tsutome o mamore
Tashikani (shumatsu no)-ji wa kuru nodearuga, sore o himete okitai no wa, kakujin ga doryoku shita tokoro ni oji, mukui o uke saseru tamedearu
Dakara, kore o shinjinaide jibun no yokubo ni shitagau-sha-tachi kara tozakari, anata o hametsu kara sukue
Anata no migite ni aru soreha nanika, musa yo
Kare wa moshiageta. `Kore wa tsuedesu. Watashi wa kore ni motare, mata hitsuji no tame ni kore de (konoha o) uchiotoshi, mata, sono soto no yo ni kyoshimasu
Kare wa ose rareta. `Musa yo, sore o nage yo
Kare ga sore o nageta tokoro, sokuza ni soreha hebi ni natte, hai mawatta
Kare wa ose rareta. `Sore o osae yo. Osorete wa naranai. Ware wa sore o gen no yo ni kaesudearou
Sorekara anata no te o, wakinoshita ni ire yo. Nani no sawari mo nai no ni, sore wa shiroku narou. Kore wa imahitotsu no shirushi
Ware ga saidai no shirushi o, anata ni shimesu tamedearu
Anata wa firuaun no moto ni ike. Hontoni kare wa koman hidodearu
Kare wa (inotte) itta. `Omo yo, watashi no mune o hirogete kudasai
Watashi no shigoto o yoi ni shite kudasai
Watashi no shita no motsure o hogushite
watashi no kotoba o, kare-ra ni wakara sete kudasai
Mata watashi no kazoku no naka kara, enjo-sha o o sazuke kudasai
Watashi no kyodai, harun o
watashi ni kasei shi
watashi no shigoto ni kyoryoku suru yo ni sa sete kudasai
Sore wa watashi-tachi ga, anata o oku tatae
mata fudan ni anata o nenzuru tamedearimasu
Hontoni anata koso, watashi-tachi o mimamori kudasa reru katadearimasu
Kare wa ose rareta. `Musa yo, hontoni anata no negai wa kikitodoke rareta
Ware wa, konomae ni mo anata ni megumi o hodokoshita
Sonotoki wa, waga ishi o anata no haha ni tsutaeta

“(Sonoko o) hako no naka ni irete, kawa ni nage yo. Kawa ga kare o kishi ni uchi age, ware no tekideari, mata kono-ko no teki ga hiroiageyou. ” Soshite anata no ue ni, ware no ai o sosogi kakeru. Sorede ware no me (hogo) no moto de sodate rareru koto ni narou

Sonotoki anata no ane ga, makari dete,“watashi ga (Sonoko o) sodateru mono o, o oshie shimashou ka. ” To itta. Koshite ware wa, haha no te ni anata o kaeshi, sorede kano on'na mo manzoku shi, kanashimi mo kieta. Mata anata wa hito o koroshita. Daga ware wa kuno kara anata o sukui, iroiro to anata o kokoromita. Sorekara su-nen no ma, madoyan no min no naka ni taizai shi, sorekara sadame rareta yo ni, anata wa koko ni kita nodearu. Musa yo
Ware wa anata o ware (ni hoshi sa seru) tame ni, sodateageta
Anata to kyodai wa, ware no shirushi o tazusaete ike. Soshite ware o nenzuru koto o okotatte wa naranai
Anata gata ryonin wa firuaun no moto ni ike. Hontoni kare wa koman hidodearu
Daga kare ni monoshizukana toki-kata de katare. Kare wa kunkai o ukeireru ka, matawa ware o osorerudearou
Kare-ra ryonin wa itta. `Omo yo, hontoni kare ga isoide watashi-tachi ni (gai o kuwae) mata hogai no koto o suru no o osoremasu
Kare wa ose rareta. `Osoreru koto wanai. Hontoni ware wa, anata gata to issho ni iru. Kiite ori mite iru nodearu

Dakara anata gata ryonin wa okonatte, kare ni itte yaru ga i. “Hontoni watashi-tachi wa, anata no omo no shitodearu. Dakara watashi-tachi to issho ni Isuraeru no shison-tachi o shakuho shi, kare-ra o kurushimete wa naranai. Hontoni watashi-tachi wa, shirushi o motte anata no nushi kara kita monodearu. Onmichibiki ni shitagau mono wa, heiandearu
Hontoni watashi-tachi ni, tashika ni keiji sa reta nodearu. Kyohi suru mono mata somuki saru mono ni wa chobatsu (ga machikamaete iru dakedearu).”
Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Musa yo, anata gata no omo wa daredearu no ka
Kare wa (kotaete) itta. `Watashi-tachi no omo koso wa, ban'yu o sozo shi, hitorihitori ni (sugata ya shishitsu sono soto o) fuyo sa re, sarani michibiki o ataeru katadearu
Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Sorenara sugisatta sedai no mono wa do naru no ka
Kare wa itta. `Sore ni kansuru chishiki wa, shosatsu ni shirusa rete omo no omoto ni arimasu. Watashi no omo wa, ayamari o okasu koto mo naku, wasureru koto mo arimasen

Kare wa, daichi o anata gata no gasho to sa re, anata gata no tame, soko ni michi o tateyoko ni tsuke, mata ten kara ame o furase rareru. Sore ni yotte, ware wa sorezore no kotonatta shiyu no shokubutsu o seicho sa seru
Tabe, mata anata gata no kachiku o hoboku shi nasai. Hontoni sono nakaniha, richi aru mono e no shuju no shirushi ga aru
